title: User is able to log in to MLB Beta
custom_preconds: Web app is in logged-out state

custom_steps_separated.content: Navigate to messaging app on mobile device
custom_steps_separated.expected: Messaging app login page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter valid login details and click login button
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is logged in successfully - contact list is displayed

title: User is unable to log in with false credentials
custom_preconds: Web app is in logged-out state

custom_steps_separated.content: Attempt to log in with false credentials

title: Forgot password link works
custom_preconds: Web app is in logged-out state

title: User can add contact successfully
custom_preconds: Web app is in logged-out state

custom_steps_separated.content: Navigate to the contact list view
custom_steps_separated.expected: Contact list is displayed along with add contact button

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter contact details in contact search field and click ok button
custom_steps_separated.expected: List of matching contacts is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Select contact from list and click add button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Contact list is displayed with additional contact - contact is in pending status
